args.natural_language_statement: Suppose that f is holomorphic in an open set Ω. Prove that if |f| is constant, then f is constant.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f is holomorphic and has constant modulus on a connected open set then f is constant.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem const_mod_imp_const {Ω : Set ℂ} (hΩ : IsOpen Ω) {f : ℂ → ℂ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ℂ f Ω) (hr : ∃ r : ℝ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, |f z| = r) : ∃ c : ℂ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, f z = c := by sorry

open Set Filter Metric Complex
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose that $f$ is holomorphic in an open set $\Omega$. Prove that if $|f|$ is constant, then $f$ is constant. -/
theorem const_mod_imp_const {Ω : Set ℂ} (hΩ : IsOpen Ω) {f : ℂ → ℂ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ℂ f Ω) (hr : ∃ r : ℝ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, |f z| = r) : ∃ c : ℂ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, f z = c"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose that f is holomorphic in an open set Ω. Prove that if |f| is constant, then f is constant. -/
theorem Shakarchi_exercise_1_13c {Ω : Set ℂ} (hΩ : IsOpen Ω) {f : ℂ → ℂ}
  (hf : DifferentiableOn ℂ f Ω) (hr : ∃ r : ℝ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, |f z| = r) :
  ∃ c : ℂ, ∀ z ∈ Ω, f z = c := by
  sorry
